member.name: T:Tizen.Messaging.Push.PushClient
member.summary: The PushClient API provides functions to connect to push service for receiving push messages.
member.remarks: The PushClient API provides the way to connect with the push service. It provides APIs to connect/disconnect from the push service. APIs are provided so that an application can register itself with the push server along with APIs to request push message.

member.name: E:Tizen.Messaging.Push.PushClient.NotificationReceived
member.summary: Event Handler for receiving the notifications.

member.name: E:Tizen.Messaging.Push.PushClient.StateChanged
member.summary: Event Handler for receiving changes in States of the connection.

member.name: M:Tizen.Messaging.Push.PushClient.PushServiceConnect(System.String)
member.summary: API to connect with the push service.
member.exception: In case of privilege not defined.
member.param: The Push Application ID Registered with the server.

member.name: M:Tizen.Messaging.Push.PushClient.PushServiceDisconnect
member.summary: API to disconnect from the push service.

member.name: M:Tizen.Messaging.Push.PushClient.PushServerRegister
member.summary: API to Register the application with the push server.
member.returns: The method returns a task, which on completion will give a ServerResponse Object.

member.name: M:Tizen.Messaging.Push.PushClient.PushServerUnregister
member.summary: API to Deregister the application from the push server.
member.returns: The method returns a task, which on completion will give a ServerResponse Object.

member.name: M:Tizen.Messaging.Push.PushClient.GetUnreadNotifications
member.summary: Gets the unread notifications for the application.

member.name: M:Tizen.Messaging.Push.PushClient.GetRegistrationId
member.summary: registration ID received from server.
member.returns: It is the string, which is the ID received from the server.

member.name: T:Tizen.Messaging.Push.PushConnectionStateEventArgs
member.summary: An extended EventArgs class, which contains the State Information.

member.name: T:Tizen.Messaging.Push.PushConnectionStateEventArgs.PushState
member.summary: Enumeration for the different states.

member.name: F:Tizen.Messaging.Push.PushConnectionStateEventArgs.PushState.Registered
member.summary: Registered with the Server.

member.name: F:Tizen.Messaging.Push.PushConnectionStateEventArgs.PushState.Unregistered
member.summary: Unregistered.

member.name: F:Tizen.Messaging.Push.PushConnectionStateEventArgs.PushState.ProvisioningIPChanged
member.summary: To change the provisioning server IP.

member.name: F:Tizen.Messaging.Push.PushConnectionStateEventArgs.PushState.PingChanged
member.summary: Ping interval is changing.

member.name: F:Tizen.Messaging.Push.PushConnectionStateEventArgs.PushState.StateError
member.summary: Error Occured in Changing State.

member.name: P:Tizen.Messaging.Push.PushConnectionStateEventArgs.State
member.summary: Gives the current state.

member.name: P:Tizen.Messaging.Push.PushConnectionStateEventArgs.Error
member.summary: Gives information about the error if set.
member.value: It is the string, which contains the error string if set.

member.name: T:Tizen.Messaging.Push.PushMessageEventArgs
member.summary: An extended EventArgs class, which contains the message received.

member.name: P:Tizen.Messaging.Push.PushMessageEventArgs.AppData
member.summary: Gives the Application Data recieved.
member.value: It is the string, which stores the application data.

member.name: P:Tizen.Messaging.Push.PushMessageEventArgs.Message
member.summary: Gives the Message Received Field.
member.value: It is the string, which stores the message field.

member.name: P:Tizen.Messaging.Push.PushMessageEventArgs.ReceivedAt
member.summary: Gives the time at which the Notification was received.
member.value: It is the DateTime field representing the time at which the Notification was received.

member.name: P:Tizen.Messaging.Push.PushMessageEventArgs.Sender
member.summary: Gives the Sender of the notification.
member.value: It is a string value representing the Sender of the Notification.

member.name: P:Tizen.Messaging.Push.PushMessageEventArgs.SessionInfo
member.summary: Gives the session ID of the notification.
member.value: It is a string value representing the session ID of the Notification.

member.name: P:Tizen.Messaging.Push.PushMessageEventArgs.RequestId
member.summary: Gives the request ID of the notification.
member.value: It is a string value representing the request ID of the Notification.

member.name: P:Tizen.Messaging.Push.PushMessageEventArgs.Type
member.summary: Gives the value in the type field of the notification.
member.value: It is an integer value representing the type field of the notification.

member.name: T:Tizen.Messaging.Push.ServerResponse
member.summary: The ServerResponse structure provides the result and the server response if any.

member.name: T:Tizen.Messaging.Push.ServerResponse.Result
member.summary: Enumeration for the Result from the server.

member.name: F:Tizen.Messaging.Push.ServerResponse.Result.Success
member.summary: Successful.

member.name: F:Tizen.Messaging.Push.ServerResponse.Result.Timeout
member.summary: Time Out Occured.

member.name: F:Tizen.Messaging.Push.ServerResponse.Result.ServerError
member.summary: Server Error Occured.

member.name: F:Tizen.Messaging.Push.ServerResponse.Result.SystemError
member.summary: System Error Occured.

member.name: P:Tizen.Messaging.Push.ServerResponse.ServerResult
member.summary: Gives the Result of the opeartion.
member.value: It is the Result state of the operation performed.

member.name: P:Tizen.Messaging.Push.ServerResponse.ServerMessage
member.summary: Gives the Message from the server.
member.value: It is the Message sent by the server.
